headerDisplay: Control your Mopar vehicle (Chrysler, Dodge, Jeep, Ram, Fiat, Alfa Romeo) through HomeKit. Requires an active Mopar.com account with Uconnect remote services subscription.
footerDisplay: For help and documentation, visit [GitHub](https://github.com/frankea/homebridge-mopar) or [report issues](https://github.com/frankea/homebridge-mopar/issues). Beta - Seeking vehicle testers!

password.title: Mopar Account Password
password.description: Same password you use to login at www.mopar.com

pin.title: 4-Digit Vehicle PIN
pin.description: The PIN you use for remote commands in the mobile app

debug.title: Enable Debug Logging
debug.description: Show detailed debug information in logs (only enable when troubleshooting)

items.helpvalue: Enter your Mopar.com account credentials (same account you use for the mobile app)
Enter the 4-digit PIN you use for remote commands
